Text:

I'm working on series 6 now, which is the last one to be released commercially.

wow, t hey never released 7, 8, or 9 on dvd?  

what a bummer.

thanks

as an FYI for anyone as dying for the stuff as I am..

The Complete Seventh Season will be released on October 5, 2010

The other two seasons are TBA, but don't hold your breath, season six was released in Feb, 2006 so we may be waiting years... only to have to wait some more for Archie Bunker's Place to be released.

I'm resisting watching them on TVLand, as it seems certain "edits" were made for re-airing.  Most of them are two minutes short.  When they were first re-aried as repeasts, producer Norman Lear said he would buy the airtime just so the network would air it complete.  Sadly, the network declined and we are now stuck with these "edits".

For those asking, you can now download the entire series (seasons 1 thru 9) at: http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6480085/All_in_the_Family__Seasons_1_thru_9_Complete

Many thanks to the original uploaders!
